scripts.build-ts: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp pb/*.proto dist/pb && chmod a+x dist/index.js
scripts.build-napi: node-gyp configure build && cp build/Release/mmap.node dist/mmap-wrapper.node
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-napi
scripts.test: npm run build && tsc -p test && nyc --reporter=lcov ava dist/test/tests
